thread.title: Rogen makes peace with Aussie radio hosts
thread.title_full: Rogen makes peace with Aussie radio hosts

title: Rogen makes peace with Aussie radio hosts
text:
Seth Rogen blasts Brisbane radio hosts Andrew Bucklow news.com.au Seth Rogen blasts Brisbane radio hosts Andrew Bucklow news.com.au They’ve made a very powerful enemy. 
UPDATE: So Seth Rogen isn’t as sensitive as a couple of Brisbane radio hosts originally thought. 
The movie star tweeted the HIT 105 breakfast show this morning to say that he was “just fu*king around with you guys. No worries. I’m fair game”. 
The tweet comes a day after radio hosts Stav Davidson and co-host Abby Coleman accidentally started a feud with the actor on Twitter, or so they thought at the time. 
The brouhaha started when the radio duo tagged Seth Rogen in a tweet as they solicited for people to call in for a talk topic. 
“Who has a celebrity lookalike & are you unhappy about it? Adrian our audio guy got told he looks like @Sethrogen on the weekend!” 
The hosts probably weren’t expecting the Knocked Up star to see the tweet, let alone respond to it, but that's exactly what happened. Other Stories
